page.title: 15EDUCATION IN STOTTESDON
page.content:
{Pre-school children}can go to a Playgroup at Chorley. {4 1/2 to 11 year olds}attend the village school in Stottesdon. {11 to 16 year olds}go to Lacon Childe school, Cleobury Mortimer.
In 1984{Stottesdon School}was threatened with closure with 22 pupils on roll. Parents, staff, parish councillors & most residents opposed closure, & a campaign followed to persuade county councillors and {Shropshire Education Department officials to reconsider. There were several meetings about this & in the end we managed to persuade them that numbers would reach the required level of 30 within 5 years, & that travelling time to any other school would be unacceptably long. {The school is safe!}
